page.title: 01The Religion of Islam
page.content:
During the post war years many Asian families have come to live in Gillingham. This has resulted in the need for schools to teach children with a multi cultural background. The dominant religion of the Asian children is that of Islam. Most of these children are not from devout families. The families have no objection to the children taking part in the Christian religious education provided in state schools. However, many children still celebrate Islamic festivals. The following text outlines some of the beliefs of this minority group.
The followers of Islam are called Muslims. We believe in Allah. The leader is MOHAMMED.
